Articles.Content:
I just got Kerbal Space program yesterday after using the demo for a while. I had some questions, and answers would be appreciated.

1.What kind of ship should I make to get to Mun?(Like a rough idea.)

2.Are there any mods I should try out when I get a grasp of the game's concept?

Thanks in advance.

Hi maple51 and welcome to the community

You'll want to try to make something with a small, lightweight lander with ASAS to begin with so you aren't having to loft too much weight, and you'll need a launcher than can get the lander into orbit.

In between you'll need a way to get the lander to the Mun, so an intermediate stage to do the transfer burn, any correction burns and at least start the Munar de-orbit is a good idea as well.

there are a lot of mods, some make the game more easy, some more dificult, I would suggest to play "vanilla" for a while , and then start with mods.

one thing I've learnd on KSP is that less is better, dont do overkill ships to go to the mun, simple stuff will work better.
